definition: see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]
end/finish
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
variant of 眷[juan4]/to care about/to look fondly on
concern/wife and children
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
love will find a way (idiom)
pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

sentences.english: The chemistry was instant and they married in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 两人立即起了化学反应，并于2007年终成眷属。

sentences.english: The Sweethearts Spring has the magic to bless people in love with the happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 情侣泉具有神奇的魔力，使相爱的人终成眷属。

sentences.english: The lovers are united at the conclusion of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 电影结尾时这对情侣终成眷属。

sentences.english: Rich people get married, money's life pain.
sentences.chinese: 有钱人终成眷属，没钱人一生痛苦。

definition: love will find a way (idiom)
pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

definition: to achieve Buddhahood through one's efforts and insight/to obtain a positive outcome after sustained efforts/to come to fruition
lovers
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to love each other
to tie the knot (idiom)/to get married
a shattered mirror put back together (idiom)/(of marriage) to pick up the pieces and start anew/for a separated couple to reconcile and reunite
destined to meet but not fated to be together (idiom)
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
true love
to have an affinity with each other (idiom)/to find each other congenial
enduring while the world lasts (idiom)/eternal
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
